Example:  Calculating the Time Limit When a Section 5103 Notice Was Not Sent to the Original Claimant
Situation
:
On 04/01/2019, VA received a claim for SC for a right hip condition.
On 06/23/2019, the Veteran died.  VA was unable to send the Section 5103 notice to the Veteran before the Veteran died.
Result
:  Since the Section 5103 notice was not sent to the original claimant, allow the substitute claimant 30 days to submit evidence when providing the Section 5103 notice.
Reference
:  For more information on language to include in the Section 5103 notice, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.C.4.g
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
